h3_title: Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud
content: The fight can feel quite fast-paced as they swap in and out to attack, so to put an end to their teamwork and slow things down, make use of spells like Immobilize. You should then aim to build as much Focus as possible and look for opportunities to perform heavy attacks. Both bosses can be staggered by this, giving you a chance to whittle down their health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud'.
The content is as follows:
The fight can feel quite fast-paced as they swap in and out to attack, so to put an end to their teamwork and slow things down, make use of spells like Immobilize. You should then aim to build as much Focus as possible and look for opportunities to perform heavy attacks. Both bosses can be staggered by this, giving you a chance to whittle down their health.
